text: Kungenzeka wena (Muhammad) uncame inxalenye yoko kutyhilwe kuwe, nentliziyo yakho ive ubunzima ngenxa yako oko ngokuba bathi: “Kutheni kaloku engathunyelelwa uvimba wobutyebi nje, okanye kuze ingelosi kuthi ihamba naye?” Kodwa wena (Muhammad) unguMlumkisi kuphela, Yena uAllâh nguMlondolozi wezinto zonke
